docs.lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Sept. 18 -- the first and second editions of "The Children's Longfellow" will appear simultaneously to-morrow, and Saturday of next week will bring the first two editions of "Cupid's Almanac," by Mr. Oliver Herford and Mr. John Cecil Clay, and no small editions are they, for Messrs.

headline.main: LONG AUTUMN LIST OF BOSTON BOOKS; Miss Agnes Repplier, George Wharton James, Phillips Oppenheim and Oliver Herford Represented.
